roleset.name: do, pull off

example.name: bad example
example.text: Our mission is to help our clients grow, and to use every tool of marketing communications *trace* to accomplish that.''
example.note: This is a bad example because it's unclear what the trace points to. I take the trace as pointing to "we" as in "We accomplish our mission using every tool of marketing communications."

roleset.note: VN, FN updated by Julia. Member of Vncls complete-55.2.

example.name: not so bad example
example.text: The President told supporters they should be proud of what-1 his administration had accomplished *trace*-1.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'accomplish' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Comparison with 'manage'.
